learn-ethereum: Learn Ethereum and web3 from A to Z in <underline>Turkish</underline> from the experts in the heart of Istanbul!

students.title: Students
cta: Understand Ethereum and web3's place in the future.
Get to know about university blockchain clubs.
Meet experts in the sector and listen to their career journey.
Find out the job opportunites in web3.

developers.title: Developers
cta: Learn how to develop decentralized applications and smart contracts.
Discover the technical problems Ethereum and blockchains trying to solve.

researchers.title: Researchers
cta: Explore the economical and sociological impact of blockchains.
Get to know about the open research questions and the latest scientific developments in Ethereum.

finance.title: Finance Professionals
cta: Get informed about the outlook of the Decentralized Finance (DeFi) applications, and where they are heading to.
Figure out how DeFi applications such as stablecoins, lending, and derivatives work.
Discover Ethereum's inner financial and economical models.

regulators.title: Regulators
cta: Identify the current status of blockchain technologies in Türkiye, and the opportunities it presents.
Learn the impact of Ethereum and web3 on politics, society, and economics.
Get informed about the related regulatory frameworks across the world.

anyone.title: Anyone Curious!
cta: Get a grasp of what Ethereum and cryptocurrencies are and how they work.
Find out the future significance of blockchain technology.
Discover how Ethereum is used in daily life.

FAQItems.a: Devconnect is a week-long gathering of independent Ethereum events. Ethereum builders, researchers, and the community come together to learn, share, and collaborate. This year, it's happening in Istanbul, Türkiye, from November 13 to November 19.

Ethereum is a global, open-source platform for decentralized applications. On Ethereum, you can write code that controls digital value, runs exactly as programmed, and is accessible anywhere in the world.

ETHGünü is a one-day event that will introduce Ethereum and web3 to the Turkish community. The event will feature talks and workshops from Ethereum experts, and will be a great opportunity to connect with the Ethereum community. The event will take place on 13 November at Istanbul Congress Center.

FAQItems.q: What am I goint to learn at ETHGünü?
FAQItems.a: You will learn about Ethereum and web3 from the experts, and get a taste of the opportunities in the ecosystem. You will also have the opportunity to connect with the Ethereum community in Turkey.

FAQItems.q: Will there be discussions or tips on pricing and trading of cryptocurrencies?
FAQItems.a: No. ETHGünü is an educational event, and will not feature discussions or tips on pricing and trading of cryptocurrencies.

FAQItems.q: What is the language of the event?
FAQItems.a: The event will be mostly in Turkish.
Yes, there will be simulataneous translations from Turkish to English, and vice versa

FAQItems.q: When are tickets going on sale?
FAQItems.a: Tickets are not on sale yet. Please sign up for our mailing list to be notified when tickets go on sale.

FAQItems.q: Will the presentations and workshops be recorded and available after the event?
FAQItems.a: Yes, all presentations and workshops will be recorded and made available online after the event.
